name: Reign of the Dead
add_text: Equip: You gain a Mote of Flame each time you cause a non-periodic spell critical strike.  When you reach 3 Motes, they will release, firing a Pillar of Flame for 1741 to 2023 damage.  Mote of Flame cannot be gained more often than once every 2 sec. (2 minutes cooldown)
